name: obsidian-ai-providers
description: A hub for setting AI providers (OpenAI-like, Ollama and more) in one place.

scripts.dev-test: concurrently "node copy-files.mjs && node esbuild.config.mjs" "npm run test:watch"
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node copy-files.mjs && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.sdk:publish: cd packages/sdk && npm run build && npm publish

author: Pavel Frankov
